translations.en: Copy of your foreign qualification certificate

hakutoiveet.preference1-Opetuspiste: Haaga-Helia University of Applied Sciences, Helsinki Pasila campus
hakutoiveet.preference1-Koulutus: Bachelor of Business Administration, DP in Business Information Technology, full-time studies

koulutustausta.pohjakoulutus_muu_kuvaus: I have finished highschool in Greece and also participated in the Panhellenics exams for higher education schools. I have also attended Eira High School for adults for 2.5 years, though I didn't not stick around to get a completion degree of sorts.

preferenceData.Opetuspiste: Haaga-Helia University of Applied Sciences, Helsinki Pasila campus
preferenceData.Koulutus: Bachelor of Business Administration, DP in Business Information Technology, full-time studies

preferenceEligibilities.rejectionBasis: Eligibility could not be checked because of missing attachments. Therefore the application cannot be taken into consideration for admission.

translations.fi:
The following copies of certificates must be submitted to the Haaga-Helia´s admission services no later than by 12 February 2016 at 3 pm.

  • foreign school certificates with translations
  • English language certificate
  • Matriculation Examination completed in Finland before year 1990,  
  • IB-, RP- or EB-Diploma
  • a decision on asylum or a residence permit granted on the basis of a need for protection
  • Anyone applying through discretionary admission is required to submit copies of the certificates that he or she wishes to invoke to the Haaga-Helia´s admission services

 

If you are applying with your IB-, RP- or EB-Diploma and you are graduating in the spring 2016, photocopy of your predicted grades or similar has to arrive to the admission service by 27 May 2016 at 3 pm.

Note! If you are graduating in the spring 2016, the educational qualification used for applying must be completed so that the final degree certificate arrives at the University of Applied Sciences by 15 July 2016 at 3 pm. This applies to educational qualifications of EU/EEA-citizens and international matriculation examinations (EB, RP). The copy of final certificate must be submitted only if you get accepted.

If you are applying with the International Baccalaureate (IB) Diploma and you are graduating in the spring 2016, photocopy of your final IB Diploma has to arrive to the admission service by 2 September 2016.

All accepted applicants must submit copies of school certificates to the Haaga-Helia UAS by 15 July 2016 at 3 pm Finnish time at the latest. Please note that you have to confirm your study place already by 15 July at 3 pm.

The admission of a student is conditional until the University of Applied Sciences has checked the applicant’s original school and other relevant certificates. The University of Applied Sciences will withdraw the admission, if the applicant does not provide his/her certificates by the deadline stated in the acceptance letter or if he/she has given inadequate or false information about his/her grades or other factors.

The application period to Bachelor programmes conducted in English will run from 8 January to 5 February 2016 at 3 p.m. Finnish time by which time applications must have arrived or been received and saved in digital format.
